entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
